1 tablespoon butter,¾ cup almonds, blanched and slivered,1 pound spinach, rinsed and torn into bite-size pieces,1 cup dried cranberries,½ cup vegetable oil,½ cup white sugar,¼ cup cider vinegar,¼ cup white wine vinegar,2 tablespoons toasted sesame seeds,1 tablespoon poppy seeds,2 teaspoons minced onion,¼ teaspoon paprika,,
